member.name: T:FHSDK.Touch.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains the entry class of the FeedHenry Xamarin SDK for iOS platform. It's defined in the FHXamarinIOSSDK.dll. To use the FeedHenry SDK, both FHSDK.dll and FHXamarinIOSSDK.dll should be referenced by your Xamarain iOS project, and initialise the SDK using the FHClient class in this name space.

member.name: M:FHSDK.Touch.FHClient.Init
member.summary: Initialise the FeedHenry SDK. This should be called before any other API functions are invoked. Usually this should be called after the app finish intialising.
member.returns: If Init is success or not
